title: Topic 001 Question 664
body: A company wants to build an application for a new line of business.
According to the AWS Well-Architected Framework, what design principles should be implemented? (Choose two.)
options: Consolidate multiple AWS accounts into a single account.
Buy and host hardware in the AWS Cloud.
Decouple the AWS Cloud architecture to break up monolithic deployments.
Move on-premises network hardware to VPCs.
Design elasticity into the AWS Cloud design.
